data.text: Ban Ki-moon invites you to become a #GlobalCitizen. Read his latest post & see photos on @LinkedIn: http://t.co/kgRnAnBFup
Ban Ki-moon welcomes Security Council pres stmnt that aims to address horrifying humanitarian situation in #Syria http://t.co/hP9p5OMjl5
Syria: @UN-@OPCW #chemicalweapons team has begun securing sites for operation. Latest details from @UN_Spokesperson http://t.co/uyeroSGJYJ
Video: @ValerieAmos on Syria humanitarian crisis, reiterates call for unhindered access to get aid to ppl in need http://t.co/7hNVR5wLWd
@ivanfca The UN is an international organization with 193 member states. If the website was down, it may have been a temporary problem.
@MrZig85 That's an official UN document forwarding a written statement by an NGO to the Human Rights Council, not a UN report.
@mitzgami Cool photo! Thanks for sharing.
@JaydeGoosen Find out about the UN Volunteers programme here: http://t.co/JZbXgpardF
What did world leaders say about women & girls at the #UNGA general debate? @UN_Women lets you know: http://t.co/9JKPHzdMN8

See what Jan Eliasson said this week about the need to step up response to humanitarian crises in Africa http://t.co/dTKaooNNkg
Wednesday is the Intl Day of Non-Violence. What is non-violent resistance? Get background info here: http://t.co/9pAFSbXsvj

"Turn your back to division & hatred; stand up for what is right & just." Wednesday is Intl Day of Non-Violence http://t.co/9pAFSbXsvj
